name: Coinbase
introduce: Coinbase is a one of the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in world founded in June 2012 by Brian Armstrong, a former Airbnb engineer. As of July 2022, approximately 98 million verified users, 13,000 institutions, and 230,000 ecosystem partners in over 100 countries trust Coinbase to easily and securely invest, spend, save, earn, and use crypto. Coinbase's mission is to increase economic freedom in the world.
